item.title: Gold Futures Rise; Trump's Tariffs Could Improve Medium-term Outlook
item.description: Gold futures rose, consolidating after losses in Monday’s session. Short-term, gold remains under pressure from the strong dollar and elevated treasur...

item.title: Winter Weather Lifts U.S. Natural Gas Futures
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures rose as prospects for a colder winter lift demand.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Trade Mixed
item.description: U.S. stocks were mixed, largely shrugging off President-elect Donald Trump’s latest tariff threat.

item.title: Federal Prosecutors Charge Star Bond Investor Ken Leech With Fraud
item.description: Leech was the chief investment officer at Franklin Templeton subsidiary Western Asset Management.
